Author: dustpandirt
Text: My company is like a small family owned business so HR isn't really an option. I don't think any of them mean it maliciously, which makes it so awkward.   I know i should just try and find a new job, but I'm not in the position to be able to do that financially :(   Im trying to grow a backbone and get some confidence to speak up though

Author: thefakemexoxo
Text: Good god. Please tell me you have some form of HR! If you do, you have to go. None of this is okay. It’s harassment. It’s bullying. It’s targeting. Also, I would call the manager of the coffee delivery person. He works in customer service and he’s not doing his job.
